paragraphs: This document explained how to create a purchase order, approve it, and receive merchandise against it. Following these steps ensures accurate inventory management and streamlined procurement processes.

This document outlines the process of creating, approving, and receiving merchandise against a Purchase Order (PO) within the retailcloud console. It is intended for inventory managers, purchasing agents, and other personnel responsible for procurement and inventory control.
By following the steps outlined in this document, users will be able to efficiently manage their purchase orders and ensure accurate inventory levels.
outcomes: Receive merchandise against a Purchase Order.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Navigate to the Purchase Orders section.
Steps / How-To.step: In the left navigation sidebar, click on 'Inventory', then click on 'Purchase Orders'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Initiate the creation of a new purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Create PO' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select a vendor for the purchase order.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Vendor Code' input field and select a vendor from the dropdown list.
Click the 'Phone' input field and enter the vendor's phone number.
Click the 'Vendor Address' textarea and enter the vendor's address.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the date for vendor ship.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Select a date' button next to the 'Vendor Ship By Date' field, then select a date from the calendar and click 'Ok'.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the date for PO expiration.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Select a date' button next to the 'PO Expiration Date' field, then select a date from the calendar and click 'Ok'.
Click the 'Location' input field and select a location from the dropdown list.
Click the 'Shipping Address' textarea and enter the shipping address.
Click the 'Ship all the Items to the...' input field and select the shipping terms from the dropdown list.
Click the 'Freight only' input field and select the freight terms from the dropdown list.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Open the item lookup to add items to the PO.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Item Lookup' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Select the items to add to the PO.
Steps / How-To.step: In the item lookup grid, select the checkboxes next to the items you want to add.
Click the 'Select Items' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Enter the quantity of the item.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the quantity input field and enter the quantity of the item.
Click the save button.
Click the 'Approve' button.
Click the 'PO approval notes' textarea and enter the approval notes.
Click the 'APPROVE' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Send the purchase order to the vendor.
Steps / How-To.step: Click the 'Send To Vendor' button.

Steps / How-To.explanation: Navigate to the Merchandise Receiving section.
Steps / How-To.step: In the left navigation sidebar, click on 'Inventory', then click on 'Merchandise Receiving'.
Click the 'Receive Merchandise' button.
Click the 'Vendor' input field and select the vendor from the dropdown list.
Click the 'PO #' input field and select the PO from the dropdown list.
Click the quantity input field and enter the quantity received.
Click the 'RECEIVE' button.

Title: Creating, Approving, and Receiving Purchase Orders
shortDescription: A guide to creating, approving, and receiving merchandise against Purchase Orders.
